General.Description: DigixDAO (DGD) is the leverage of the Distributed Ledger for the persistence, also allows to transfer  the auditability by its precious applications. Its tokens was based on Ethereum, which helps Digix create a range of technologies including The Proof of Asset Protocol (POA) and Digix Gold Tokens (DGX).
General.Features: DigixDAO is considered as a decentralised autonomous currency without a fully proven concept. The Digix DAO tokens allows users to vote on how funds earned and how it spent. Besides, you even can earn profits from the trading of DGX tokens. Moreover, both DAO or DGD tokens are open-source, therefore, you can use them free.
General.Technology: The DAO token is built on Ethereum. On the Ethereum foundation, Digix enables take delivery of DGX at our partnering custodial vault purchase billion from LBMA refineries with accompanying Assay Certificates from refiners ranging from Valcambi, PAMP Suisse, Nadir Bullion.An established auditor, Inspectorate Bureau Veritas, provides quarterly audits of every single Gold asset in our Safe House vaults. Last but not least, the records of proof are published permanently using Ethereum and IPFS.

ICO.Description: The ICO has been raised $5.5million and developed this system of proving asset existence and ownership on the distributed ledger.
